## kl list apps

Get list of apps in selected environment



### Options

```
  -e, --env string      environment name
  -h, --help            help for apps
  -o, --output string   output format [table | json | yaml] (default "table")
  -q, --quiet           quiet output
  -v, --verbose         verbose output
  -h, --help   help for apps
```
